accounting_business_pathways.name: Accounting and Business
accounting_business_pathways.description: Pathways tailored for students aiming to enter accounting, finance, and business degrees. These typically include foundation programs, diploma courses, and enabling programs that cover core business subjects such as accounting principles, economics, finance, and management. Successful completion often guarantees progression into bachelor or postgraduate business-related degrees.

accounting_business_pathways.name: Accounting and Business Pathways
accounting_business_pathways.description: Diploma or foundation studies in business, commerce, or accounting.

similar_pathways.name: These pathways provide core business knowledge and guarantee progression into related bachelor degrees, often with credit.
